title: Actions with Multiple Parameters
description:
In this task, all three call blocks for the CompareNumbers action are called in the Main action. Build the CompareNumbers action so that it compares the a and b parameters. A finished program will output the following.

14 is smaller than 21
22 is equal to 22
73 is larger than 54
hint: In this problem, drop in the conditional block and write the boolean expressions to identify when a is less than b, when a is greater than b, and when a equals b. Then drop in the matching output block. As a reminder, the name, number of parameters, and type should match when calling an action. Trace the values used in each action call to predict what the results will be.
